notificationsExplanation: so your team members can reach you on Grape.
connectionTrouble: We're having trouble connecting to Grape.
noRoomFound: We could not find what you were looking for - the group might have been deleted, renamed or moved.
noMessageFound: We could not find the message you were looking for.
grapeCallPmInvitationContent: invites you to a Grape call …
_grapeCallPmInvitationContent.comment: Browser notification for incoming pm Grape Call.
_grapeCallPmMissedContent.comment: Browser notification for missed pm Grape Call.
inviteToOrganization: Invite a new person to your organization
everyoneInvited: Everyone has been invited to this group
dropFileToUpload: Drop your file to upload it!
_dropFileToUpload.comment: Hint on the drop overlay screen.
dropFileToUploadMaxFileSize: We support almost every file type up to a size of {limit}mb.
_dropFileToUploadMaxFileSize.comment: Hint on the drop overlay screen.
usersAreTyping: {users} and {othersAmount} {othersAmount, plural, one {other} other {others}} are typing
_imageWithDescr.comment: **Used when rendered inline image from markdown with description.**
_imageWithoutDescr.comment: **Used when rendered inline image from markdown without description.**
_joinVideoConference.comment: Sidebar: link to join a video conference
oneCallSameTime: You can only be in one call at the same time.
userInAnotherCall: {name} is in another call right now.
_recalculateScrollPosition.comment: Message showing when the user resizes the browser window.
_moreServices.comment: More Services button in message nlp create task dialog.
_linkToAConnectedTask.comment: Nlp create task dialog link label.
messageNotSendCheckConnection: The message couldn't be sent. Check your internet connection and
roomIsPublic: This group is public. Every member can join and read the history.
roomIsPrivate: This group is private. Only invited members can see and join this group.
inviteMoreToGroup: Invite more people to this group
_inviteMoreToGroup.comment: Room Info Panel: invite people to the group/room
_addServiceIntegration.comment: Room Info Panel: link to add an integration to the current room
pmIntro: This is a private conversation between you and {partner}.{br}Private conversations are only accessible to the two of you.
justInvited: Congratulations! You just invited {user} {amount, plural, =0 {} one {and one more people} other {and {amount} more people}}.
communication: Communicating with Grape universe, this may take a moment
noChannelsToChatIn: You have no people or groups to chat with at the moment. Join a group or start a new conversation to have more fun.
groupIncomingDescription: {name} invited you to the group call
unsuportedBrowserIncomingCall: Sorry, video conferencing isn’t supported in this browser
unsupportedBrowserShort: Unfortunately, the browser you are using at the moment doesn’t support video conferencing with Grape Call.
pleaseUseDesktopApp: Please use our {desktopApp} instead ({download}, if you haven’t installed it yet). Alternatively you can use Grape with {browsers} to enjoy the full experience.
introTextWelcome: Grape is a chat application for teams. We help you to make your team communication more efficient, productive and fun. If you haven't used Grape already, we recommend you to take our 90 seconds tutorial.
introTextSearchBrowser: Search appointments, files and more from service integrations (like Google Apps or Exchange) or browse the web (e.g. GIFs). To open Grape Search click the button or press #
introTextGroups: Chat groups can be public or private and can be based on projects, topics (e.g. daily lunch) or your departments (e.g. marketing).
introTextPm: Start quickly private conversations with your colleagues - even if they haven’t joined Grape yet.
introTextSearch: Search conversations, browse your mentions or view shared files - these handy helpers make your life a lot easier.
_addTeamMembersLinkIntro.comment: Link to the members admin within 'Well done' intro screen.
_connectServicesLinkIntro.comment: Link to the integrations admin within 'Well done' intro screen.
introTextDone: Don't forget to {addTeamMembersLink} and to {connectServicesLink}. If you have any question, do not hesitate to write us!
inviteGuest: Invite a guest to this group
inviteToOrgNote: Invite multiple users at once, just separate their email addresses with a comma.
InviteToOrgMessage: You can add personal message to the invitation email.
_loadingLink.comment: used in invite to org link input placeholder, while link is loading
inviteToOrgError: Enter valid email addresses separated by a comma.
_linkAttachmentRemoveDialogTitle.comment: Link attachment Remove Dialog: modal dialog title
_linkAttachmentRemoveDialogAdminDomain.c: Link attachment Remove Dialog: remove all the links from this domain
_linkAttachmentRemoveDialogAdminLinkForO: Link attachment Remove Dialog: remove this link for the entire org
_linkAttachmentRemoveDialogCancel.commen: Link attachment Remove Dialog: close the dialog without removing the attachment
_linkAttachmentRemoveDialogConfirm.comme: Link attachment Remove Dialog: confirm attachment removal
linkAttachmentRemoveDialogAdminCheckbox: Disable future attachments from this website?
_linkAttachmentRemoveDialogAdminCheckbox: Link attachment Remove Dialog: admin checkbox to remove the link for the organization
linkAttachmentRemoveDialogMessage: Are you sure you wish to remove this attachment from the message?
_linkAttachmentRemoveDialogMessage.comme: Link attachment Remove Dialog: ask user to confirm removal.
loginHint: Please log in to join the conversation on Grape.

_manageGroupsJoinedBtn.comment: Manage Groups Dialog: leave button label

inlineStylesExample: You can write in *italic*, **bold** and in ~~strike trough~~
blockquoteExample: > One of the coolest products I've used in a while
markdownTipsPitch: How to improve your chat messages with some nifty styles

_dateSeparatorYesterday.comment: Date separator used in history, search, mentions etc.

roomDeleteDialogInputLabel: Please type in the name of the group to confirm

roomDeleteDialogProvideName: Please enter the name of the group you want to delete.
labeledMessagesNoContentTitle: This is where the magic happens.
labeledMessagesNoContentText1: Grape automatically summarizes your conversations, so you can browse and find them based on context - we call it “amplified intelligence”.
labeledMessagesNoContentText2: Write a few Tasks or Questions to see them appear here!
newImportantMessages: {amount} {amount, plural, one {new important message} other {new important messages}}
trainingModeHintWithLink: IA: This system is in training mode ({learnMoreLink})
emptyPinnedMessagesSidebarHeadline: No messages have been pinned yet!

emptyPinnedMessagesSidebarDescription: Choose "Pin message" in the context menu of any message to make it show up here.
_emptyPinnedMessagesSidebarDescription.c: Description in the sidebar, pinned messages zero design.
